// Name        : water.cpp

#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long double n,m;
		cin>>n;
		cin>>m;
		long double cn,fn,cm,fm;
		cn=ceil(n/2);
		fn=floor(n/2);
		cm=ceil(m/2);
		fm=floor(m/2);
		long long x=cn*fm+fn*cm;
		long long y=m*n;
		long long z=__gcd(x,y);
		cout<<x/z<<"/"<<y/z<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
